reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's oversized fit and find it well-made, with many appreciating its many color options. Customers find it thick enough to stay warm in winter without being too bulky, and one mentions it works well in 40-50° weather.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Quality
items.body: picked up the LILLUSORY Oversized Sweater (Black, Size S) for some cozy 2025 fall outfits, and wow—when they say oversized, they really mean EXTREMELY oversized. I usually expect a relaxed fit with sweaters like this, but this one is almost tunic-length on me, with super roomy sleeves and a very slouchy silhouette. Not a bad thing at all—just be prepared! That said, the knit is lightweight, soft, and surprisingly warm without feeling bulky. It’s great for layering over a tank or pairing with leggings or skinny jeans. The crewneck is flattering, and the overall style is trendy without trying too hard. If you love a dramatic oversized look, this is perfect. If you're on the fence or between sizes, you might want to size down (though even then, it’ll still be roomy!). Overall, a cozy, stylish fall/winter pullover—just keep the extreme oversize factor in mind! Read more
items.author: Lhab

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
items.body: Absolutely obsessed with this sweater! Accurate sizing, super soft and stretchy, accurate length, thick, comfortable, does not shrink, accurate color, no odors, no loose threads Read more
items.author: Mattelyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product
items.body: Cute! I love the side slits so I can tuck the front. It's a thick material that you can't see through. I love the baggy fit. I love the tight wrist fit. It's overall timeless and comfortable. I am very happy with the purchase and I highly recommend. It is true to size, remember it's made to run big so I would not size up. I typically order a small and I got a small...it's exactly what I hoped for. Read more
items.author: Katie S.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars My favorite sweater!
items.body: I have this sweater in 3 colors and I want to get more! -This sweater is a great length! I have a long torso and it is hard to find long enough sweaters. This one hits right below my waist. For other people it might even cover their bottom, which would be great. -This sweater is warm! It is a heavier weight sweater and it is perfect for the Minnesota winters! -I love the baggy sleeves and body. It is cozy and comfy while also being cute. -The fabric is soft and not itchy at all. It feels like it’s a good quality. -The sweaters hold up well after washing. I wash and hand dry these sweaters. After over a year of use they have minimal pilling. When they do pill I have a fabric shaver that I use and they are as good as new! Read more
items.author: Kelly A

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Regular size is oversized enough
items.body: Nice oversized fitting sweater. Soft fabric, not scratchy. Color is perfect - like the mustard color shown in the listing. I would say the fit looks very much like the image in the listing. I got this in the yellow and the khaki and they are both very true to the color shown in the listing. For reference I am 5'6", 140lbs, larger on bottom than on top and I ordered a medium. Sleeves a good length, I prefer to cuff them over leaving the long narrow end and they are still plenty long enough even when cuffed. I think this is going to be a great sweater to wear with jeans or leggings, dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: Becky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Shirt!
items.body: I love this shirt that I want it in every color! I ordered a small- I’m 125lbs and 5’3”. It fits fine but I think I’m going to try an XS for a bit less oversized looked. It fits a bit loose and looks great, very comfortable and fabric is not itchy. Really great piece! I would order a small again and will update after I get the XS Read more
items.author: kas513

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: The quality of this sweater , the fit true to size. Comfortable and gorgeous Nancy. Harmon Read more
items.author: Marv Harmon

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost Perfect Sweater
items.body: I really like this sweater! There are so many colors! They go with everything; they are really comfy and warm; and they machine wash and dry without a care. I now own 8 of them!! So why did I give this gorgeous sweater only four stars? The one thing that bothers me is the fact that the seams are on the outside of the sweater. The designer must have thought this was making a fashion forward statement; however, I just find it annoying and wrong. I also bought the Christmas sweater version, and those seams are inside, where seams are supposed to be!! Please make more for next winter, but put the seams inside, and then I can give this beautiful sweater a 5 star rating. Read more
items.author: Joyce M. Cini

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue White, Light Coffee, Nutmeg, Deep Green, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Orange, Brick Red, Rose Red, Royal Purple, Lavender, Darkapricot White, Colorblockpink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
